markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Magic Fang](/Spells.aspx?ID=179)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 349 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Choose one of the target's [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attacks. You cause that unarmed attack to shine with primal energy. The unarmed attack becomes a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280)_ unarmed attack, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of damage dice to two if it had only one.
name: Magic Fang

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 349 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

 

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Make a creature's unarmed attacks magical temporarily.
</summary>
summary: Make a creature's unarmed attacks magical temporarily.
summary_markdown: Make a creature's unarmed attacks magical temporarily.
text: Magic Fang Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 349 4.0 Tradition Primal Cast somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 willing creature Duration 1 minute --- Choose one of the target's unarmed attacks. You cause that unarmed attack to shine with primal energy. The unarmed attack becomes a +1 striking unarmed attack, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of damage dice to two if it had only one.
